nodes.text: Levet's farm was a farm located on the planet Mandalore, and owned by the Mandalorian known as Levet. Located approximately ten kilometers outside of Mandalore's capital city, Keldabe, Levet's farm was only a short distance down a simple dirt road from the Beviin-Vasur farm. One night, in the year 41 ABY, a group of Mandalorians had gathered at Levet's farm for a celebration that carried well into the early morning hours. Noise, singing, and laughter from the revelers could be heard for some distance away.
Levet's farm was first brought into Star Wars canon with a mention in the 2008 novel, Legacy of the Force: Revelation by author Karen Traviss.
